</div>


```{r}
#| echo: true
#| code-fold: true
#| code-summary: "<small>Code</small>"

library(dplyr)
library(tibble)

df <- data.frame(patient = c("Mal.1", "Mal.2", "Mal.3"),
                 virus.A = c(12, 19, 13),
                 virus.B = c(7, 7, 10),
                 virus.C = c(11, 4, 5))
kable(df) %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE, position = "center", font_size = 24)
```
